p: FKBP5 was cloned into pCMV-3Tag-8 (Agilent Technologies, Santa Clara, CA, USA, # 240203) to generate FKBP5-FLAG. Deletion mutants of FKBP5-FLAG were constructed using a Q5 ® Site-Directed Mutagenesis Kit (New England Biolabs, Ipswich, MA, USA). Human IKKα was cloned into pCMV-3Tag-8 to generate IKKα-HA and IKKα-Myc.
